content.rendered:
Reuben Segal has over 20 years’ experience in the offshore and shipping sectors, covering both engineering design and ship surveying. He is a naval architect and has extensive recent global business development experience with a focus on design and construction of offshore oil and gas assets, including MODU and MOPU units from FEED through to yard delivery. Mr Segal holds a Master’s degree in Engineering from the University of Newcastle. Mr Segal resides in Dubai, UAE.

Contact

Dubai | +971 (0)4 379 3612
